net.kemitix.mon.maybe.Maybe

Packages that use Maybe
Package
Description
net.kemitix.mon.maybe
An experiment in creating something similar to a Type-Alias in Java.
net.kemitix.mon.result
An experiment in creating something similar to a Type-Alias in Java.
net.kemitix.mon.tree
Tree data structures.

    Method
    Description

    Maybe.filter​(Predicate<T> predicate)
    Filter a Maybe by the predicate, replacing with Nothing when it fails.

    Maybe.findFirst​(Stream<T> stream)
    Creates a Maybe from the first item in the stream, or nothing if the stream is empty.

    Maybe.flatMap​(Function<T,​Maybe<R>> f)
    Monad binder maps the Maybe into another Maybe using the binder method f.
    static <T> Maybe<T>
    Maybe.just​(T value)
    Create a Maybe for the value that is present.
    <R> Maybe<R>
    Maybe.map​(Function<T,​R> f)
     
    static <T> Maybe<T>
    Maybe.maybe​(T value)
    Create a Maybe for the value that may or may not be present.
    static <T> Maybe<T>
    Maybe.nothing()
    Create a Maybe for a lack of a value.
    Maybe<T>
    Maybe.or​(Supplier<Maybe<T>> alternative)
    Maps the Maybe into another Maybe only when it is nothing.
    Maybe<T>
    Maybe.peek​(Consumer<T> consumer)
    Provide the value within the Maybe, if it exists, to the Consumer, and returns this Maybe.

    Creates a Maybe from the Result, where the Result is a success, then the Maybe will contain the value.

    Swaps the inner Result of a Maybe, so that a Result is on the outside.
